Package icyllis.arc3d.engine

Class BackendTexture

java.lang.Object
icyllis.arc3d.engine.BackendTexture
Direct Known Subclasses:
GLBackendTexture, VkBackendTexture
public abstract class BackendTexture extends Object
A BackendTexture instance is initialized once, and may be shared.

      Returns:
      external texture

    • isMipmapped

      public abstract boolean isMipmapped()
      Returns:
      whether the texture has mip levels allocated or not

    • getGLTextureInfo

      public boolean getGLTextureInfo(GLTextureInfo info)
      If the backend API is OpenGL, copies a snapshot of the GLTextureInfo struct into the passed in pointer and returns true. Otherwise, returns false if the backend API is not OpenGL.

    • glTextureParametersModified

      public void glTextureParametersModified()
      Call this to indicate that the texture parameters have been modified in the GL context externally to Context.

      Tells client that these parameters of the texture are changed out of client control (for example, you called glTexParameteri without using GLDevice). The local states will be forced to reset to a known state when next use.

    • getVkImageInfo

      public boolean getVkImageInfo(VulkanImageInfo info)
      If the backend API is Vulkan, copies a snapshot of the VkImageInfo struct into the passed in pointer and returns true. This snapshot will set the mImageLayout to the current layout state. Otherwise, returns false if the backend API is not Vulkan.

    • setVkImageLayout

      public void setVkImageLayout(int layout)
      Anytime the client changes the VkImageLayout of the VkImage captured by this BackendTexture, they must call this function to notify pipeline of the changed layout.

    • setVkQueueFamilyIndex

      public void setVkQueueFamilyIndex(int queueFamilyIndex)
      Anytime the client changes the QueueFamilyIndex of the VkImage captured by this BackendTexture, they must call this function to notify pipeline of the changed layout.

    • getBackendFormat

      @Nonnull public abstract BackendFormat getBackendFormat()
      Get the BackendFormat for this texture.

    • isProtected

      public abstract boolean isProtected()
      Returns true if we are working with protected content.

    • isSameTexture

      public abstract boolean isSameTexture(BackendTexture texture)
      Returns true if both textures are valid and refer to the same API texture.
